page.title: 161985 YOUNG FASHION
page.content: The young people of Axbridge wear things like{t-shirts, luminous socks, {baggies, mini-skirts, slit skirts, {bat-winged jumpers.}Another popular fashion is{break dancing clothing. Break dancing is a style of dance that includes gymnastic type of movements such as head spins; twirls and somersaults. The uniform for{Axbridge school}is a maroon jumper with white or grey shirts. {Fairlands school}uniform is a grey jumper with a blue shirt or blouse; Trousers and skirts are grey. I don't mind having to wear a uniform as it leaves all our other clothes for out of school use. I like wearing loose comfortable clothes. baggy trousers and jumpers.For summer I prefer cotton pastel coloured clothes.I am a girl aged 12.
